flavorText: Textiles at the Inventors' Fair feature threads from every corner of Kaladesh.

foreignData.flavorText: Textilien auf der Erfindermesse enthalten Fäden aus allen Ecken Kaladeshs.
foreignData.name: Gedeihender Steinbock
foreignData.text:
Wenn der Gedeihende Steinbock ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du {E}{E} (zwei Energiemarken).
Immer wenn der Gedeihende Steinbock angreift, kannst du {E}{E} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf ihn.

foreignData.flavorText: Los tejidos expuestos en la Feria de Inventores contienen lana de todos los rincones de Kaladesh.
foreignData.name: Íbice impetuoso
foreignData.text:
Cuando el Íbice impetuoso entre al campo de batalla, obtienes {E}{E} (dos contadores de energía).
Siempre que el Íbice impetuoso ataque, puedes pagar {E}{E}. Si lo haces, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre él.

foreignData.flavorText: Les fibres des textiles présentés à la Foire des inventeurs proviennent des quatre coins de Kaladesh.
foreignData.name: Bouquetin prospère
foreignData.text:
Quand le Bouquetin prospère arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez {E}{E} (deux marqueurs « énergie »).
À chaque fois que le Bouquetin prospère attaque, vous pouvez payer {E}{E}. Si vous faites ainsi, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur lui.

foreignData.flavorText: I tessuti venduti alla Fiera degli Inventori sono ricavati da fibre provenienti da ogni angolo di Kaladesh.
foreignData.name: Stambecco Vigoroso
foreignData.text:

Ogniqualvolta lo Stambecco Vigoroso attacca, puoi pagare {E}{E}. Se lo fai, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su di esso.

foreignData.flavorText: 発明展覧会では、カラデシュ中のありとあらゆる繊維を使った織物を見かける。
foreignData.name: 亢進するアイベックス
foreignData.text:
亢進するアイベックスが戦場に出たとき、あなたは{E}{E}（エネルギー・カウンター２個）を得る。
亢進するアイベックスが攻撃するたび、あなたは{E}{E}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ヤギ

foreignData.flavorText: 발명 박람회의 직물은 칼라데시산 원사를 사용한 것이 특징이다.
foreignData.name: 원기왕성한 염소
foreignData.text:
원기왕성한 염소가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 {E}{E}(에너지 카운터 두 개)를 얻는다.
원기왕성한 염소가 공격할 때마다, 당신은 {E}{E}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 원기왕성한 염소에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.

foreignData.flavorText: A área têxtil da Feira dos Inventores tem fios provenientes de todos os cantos de Kaladesh.

Toda vez que Íbex Vigoroso ataca, você pode pagar {E}{E}. Se fizer isso, coloque um marcador +1/+1 nele.

Каждый раз, когда Здоровый Козерог атакует, вы можете заплатить {E}{E}. Если вы это делаете, положите на него один жетон +1/+1.

name: Thriving Ibex
originalText:
When Thriving Ibex enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Ibex attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: {E} is the energy symbol. It represents one energy counter.
Energy counters are a kind of counter that a player may have. They're not associated with specific permanents. (Other kinds of counters that players may have include poison and experience.)
Keep careful track of how many energy counters each player has. You may do so by keeping a running count on paper, by using a die, or by any other clear and mutually agreeable method.

If an effect says you get one or more {E}, you get that many energy counters. To pay one or more {E}, you lose that many energy counters. Any effects that interact with counters a player gets, has, or loses can interact with energy counters.
Energy counters aren't mana. They don't go away as steps, phases, and turns end, and effects that add mana “of any type” to your mana pool can't give you energy counters.
You can't pay more energy counters than you have.

Some triggered abilities state that you “may pay” a certain amount of {E}. You can't pay that amount multiple times to multiply the effect. You simply choose whether or not to pay that amount of {E} as the ability resolves, and no player may take actions to try to stop the ability's effect after you make your choice.

text:
When Thriving Ibex enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Ibex attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
